This is an exclusive interview with Vishal Aher, NCP candidate from Ward No. 2, ahead of the PCMC Election 2026. In this conversation, he makes serious allegations against Mayor Rahul Jadhav, stating that the ruling leadership has lost touch with public issues. He strongly opposes the release of sewage water into natural drains and accuses authorities and leaders of avoiding responsibility by claiming natural drains cannot be closed. Vishal Aher alleges that incomplete work on water issues is being showcased as full development. He also demands a 50% concession in education, highlights unresolved housing issues, lack of basic amenities, and long-pending DP roads. He credits major development works to Ajit PawarтАЩs tenure and claims that Pimpri-ChinchwadтАЩs growth has stalled since then. According to him, without Ajit Pawar, real development in the city is not possible. This interview presents his views and allegations for public awareness. The final judgment lies with the citizens.
I Am Citizen.

Where is this water coming from?!
In Pimpri-Chinchwad, shocking visuals reveal water being pumped into wells through pipes and then sold to housing societies via tankers. There are serious suspicions of illegal connections to municipal water pipelines, creating artificial scarcity to fuel a massive tanker mafia operation worth billions. Citizens face pressure and intimidation when they try to complain. This is not an allegation-driven story but a demand for accountability. Through I Am Citizen, residents call for an immediate investigation into tanker operators, pipeline audits, and a public report by PCMC. Water is a basic human rightтАФnot a black-market commodity.

Bhosari MLA Maheshdada Landge had firmly assured citizens that liquor shops near residential areas, schools, hospitals, and religious places would be permanently shut. Many women trusted those words. However, the ground reality in ChikhaliтАУMoshi tells a different story, where an alcohol shop continues to operate just steps away from the very location where the issue was raised. As per law, such sales are illegal, raising serious questions for Maheshdada Landge, the administration, and enforcement authorities. This is not an allegation, but a comparison between a public promise and present reality. WomenтАЩs safety and public trust must exist beyond speechesтАФon the streets, in real action.

Near Savata Maharaj Temple in Jadhavwadi, Pimpri-Chinchwad Municipal CorporationтАЩs confusing planning has come under scrutiny. The same premises show signs of an Urdu school, a municipal school, and now a so-called Urban Ayushman Arogya Mandir. While records suggest the health center is operational, in reality it appears to be non-functional and used as a storage space. Essential services like doctors, medicines, and health checkups exist only on paper. Citizens are demanding immediate activation of the health center with all promised facilities. Paper development without real services is misleading, and residents are now demanding accountability.

In Jadhavwadi, Pimpri-Chinchwad, a public toilet built under the Swachh Bharat Mission exists only in name. With no water, electricity, or cleanliness, citizensтАФespecially womenтАФare forced to resort to open defecation again. Despite clear guidelines and heavy public spending, the absence of basic facilities raises serious questions about corruption and accountability. This is not an allegation but ground reality captured on video. Citizens are now demanding immediate administrative action, transparency in expenditure, and strict punishment for those responsible. If public money leads to insecurity and humiliation, it cannot be called development.

This video exposes the harsh ground reality of Ward No. 2, Jadhavwadi, Pimpri-Chinchwad, where citizens pay taxes on time but receive no basic facilities like roads, water, and electricity. Social activist Vishalbhau Aher raises powerful questions on governance failure. Under Article 21 (Right to Life) and Article 14 (Right to Equality) of the Indian Constitution, every citizen deserves a dignified life. I Am Citizen is amplifying this voice for justice and accountability.

рджреБрд╕рд░реАрдХрдбреЗ рдорд╛рддреНрд░ рд╢рд╣рд░рднрд░ рдЦрд╛рдЬрдЧреА рдЗрдВрдЯрд░рдиреЗрдЯ рдХреЗрдмрд▓рдЪреЗ рдЕрд╡реИрдз рдЬрд╛рд│реЗ рдореЛрдХрд╛рдЯ рдкрд╕рд░рдд рдЖрд╣реЗ. рд╕реНрд╡рд╕реНрдд рдЖрдгрд┐ рд╕реБрд░рдХреНрд╖рд┐рдд рд╕рд░рдХрд╛рд░реА рдЗрдВрдЯрд░рдиреЗрдЯ рджреБрд░реНрд▓рдХреНрд╖рд┐рдд рдХрд░реВрди рдирд╛рдЧрд░рд┐рдХрд╛рдВрдирд╛ рдорд╣рд╛рдЧрдбреНрдпрд╛ рдЦрд╛рдЬрдЧреА рд╕реЗрд╡рд╛рдВрдХрдбреЗ рдврдХрд▓рд▓реЗ рдЬрд╛рдд рдЖрд╣реЗ. рдпрд╛рдореБрд│реЗ рдпреБрд╡рдХрд╛рдВрдЪреЗ рд░реЛрдЬрдЧрд╛рд░, рдбрд┐рдЬрд┐рдЯрд▓ рдЗрдВрдбрд┐рдпрд╛ рдЖрдгрд┐ рдЧрд░реАрдм рдирд╛рдЧрд░рд┐рдХрд╛рдВрдЪреЗ рд╣рдХреНрдХ рдереЗрдЯ рдзреЛрдХреНрдпрд╛рдд рдЖрд▓реЗ рдЖрд╣реЗрдд.

Maharashtra has lost one of its greatest social reformers and labour leaders.
Dr. Babasaheb тАЬBabaтАЭ Adhav, a lifelong fighter for the rights of unorganised workers, passed away, marking the end of a revolutionary era.

He dedicated his life to uplift
hamals, street vendors, waste pickers, and the most neglected sections of societyтАФ
giving them dignity, rights, and collective strength through the historic Hamal Panchayat.

From the 1952 food price protest to the Samyukta Maharashtra Movement and the тАЬOne Village One Water SourceтАЭ campaign,
his contribution shaped modern social justice movements in Maharashtra.

Recipient of the Times of India Social Impact Lifetime Achievement Award,
Baba Adhav may have left us physically, but his ideas will continue to guide generations.

This is not just a tributeтАФit is a reminder to continue his unfinished mission of justice and equality.

NOTA (None Of The Above) is the legal weapon of Indian voters to reject unworthy candidates.
After the historic Supreme Court judgment in 2013, and the official notification by the Election Commission of India in 2015, NOTA was made mandatory on every EVM across the country.

If a candidate is corrupt, criminal, or unfit for public service,
voters are legally empowered to say тАЬNOтАЭ without revealing their identity.
NOTA is not just a protestтАФit is a warning system of democracy.

Sometimes, protecting democracy means choosing тАЬNOтАЭ over a forced тАЬYESтАЭ.

I Am Citizen empowers people with awareness of their legal and constitutional rights.
No good candidate?
Use NOTAтАФyour silence is more dangerous than your vote.

A shocking leopard attack occurred at 4 AM in Moshi Gaothan, Pimpri-Chinchwad. The wild animal entered a residential wada near Dilip BorateтАЩs house, killed two calves, and dragged away three others. Local residents narrowly escaped. The leopard later fled towards Nageshwar Temple.

The Balaji Ramji Alhat Playground at Shriram Chowk is in a shocking condition and poses a serious threat to school students, children, and sport players.
Broken glass bottles, garbage, debris, no drinking water, no shade and unsafe surroundings have turned a student sports ground into a hazardous zone.

This ground should be a place for school students, young athletes, and fitness activities, but it has become a symbol of urban negligence and child safety failure.
While political events are organised here, basic sports infrastructure for students is completely ignored.

In Pimpri-Chinchwad, the MNS Municipal Workers Union has made serious allegations of massive corruption against former PCMC Commissioner Shekharsingh Shekhawat.
Union leader Rupesh Baji Pathekar warned that if MNS comes to power, every corruption file will be opened.
MNS Traffic Sena City President Sunil Bhau Kadam was also present during the statement.
This development has triggered a major political stir in PCMC ahead of upcoming elections.

Big update for all teaching aspirants!
CBSE has officially started CTET February 2026 online registration.
The application process began on 27 November 2025, and the last date to apply is 18 December 2025.

The CTET 2026 exam will be conducted on 8 February 2026 in two shifts for Paper-I and Paper-II.
Each paper will carry 150 questions for 150 marks.
CTET qualification is mandatory for teaching jobs in government and private schools across India.

videos.description:
ЁЯЪи рднреЛрд╕рд░реА MIDC рдЪреА рдзрдХреНрдХрд╛рджрд╛рдпрдХ рдкрд░рд┐рд╕реНрдерд┐рддреА рд╕рдореЛрд░! ЁЯЪи

рдкрд┐рдВрдкрд░реА-рдЪрд┐рдВрдЪрд╡рдб (PCMC) рдЪреНрдпрд╛ рдФрджреНрдпреЛрдЧрд┐рдХ рдХреНрд╖реЗрддреНрд░рд╛рдЪреА рдЕрд╡рд╕реНрдерд╛ рдЕрддреНрдпрдВрдд рдмрд┐рдХрдЯ рдЭрд╛рд▓реА рдЖрд╣реЗ. рдЬрд┐рдереЗ рд╕реНрд╡рдЪреНрдЫрддрд╛ рдЖрдгрд┐ рд╕реБрд╡рд┐рдзрд╛ рдЕрдкреЗрдХреНрд╖рд┐рдд рдЖрд╣реЗрдд, рддрд┐рдереЗ рдлрдХреНрдд рдХрдЪрд░рд╛, рдЕрд╕реНрд╡рдЪреНрдЫрддрд╛ рдЖрдгрд┐ рдЙрдШрдбрдкрдгреЗ рдЪрд╛рд▓рд▓реЗрд▓рд╛ рднреНрд░рд╖реНрдЯрд╛рдЪрд╛рд░ рджрд┐рд╕рдд рдЖрд╣реЗ. рд╣рд╛ рд╡реНрд╣рд┐рдбрд┐рдУ рднреЛрд╕рд░реА рдПрдордЖрдпрдбреАрд╕реАрдордзреАрд▓ (Bhosari MIDC) 'рд╕реНрд╡рдЪреНрдЫрддрд╛ рдЧрд╛рдпрдм' рдЖрдгрд┐ 'рд▓реВрдЯ рдорд╛рддреНрд░ рдЙрдШрдбреНрдпрд╛рд╡рд░' рдпрд╛ рдЧрдВрднреАрд░ рдкреНрд░рд╢реНрдирд╛рд╡рд░ рдкреНрд░рдХрд╛рд╢ рдЯрд╛рдХрддреЛ.

рдирд╛рдЧрд░рд┐рдХ рдЖрдгрд┐ рдЙрджреНрдпреЛрдЬрдХ рдХрд░ рднрд░рддрд╛рдд, рдкрдг рд╕реБрд╡рд┐рдзрд╛рдВрдЪреНрдпрд╛ рдирд╛рд╡рд╛рдЦрд╛рд▓реА рддреНрдпрд╛рдВрдирд╛ рдХрд╛рдп рдорд┐рд│рдд рдЖрд╣реЗ? рдпрд╛ рд╡реНрд╣рд┐рдбрд┐рдУрдордзреНрдпреЗ рдЖрдореНрд╣реА рдкреНрд░рддреНрдпрдХреНрд╖ рдЬрд╛рдЧреЗрд╡рд░ рдЬрд╛рдКрди рддрд┐рдерд▓реА рднрдпрд╛рдирдХ рдкрд░рд┐рд╕реНрдерд┐рддреА рджрд╛рдЦрд╡рд▓реА рдЖрд╣реЗ.

рддреБрдордЪрд╛ рдЖрд╡рд╛рдЬ рдорд╣рддреНрддреНрд╡рд╛рдЪрд╛ рдЖрд╣реЗ!

рд╣рд╛ рдлрдХреНрдд рдПрдХ рд╡реНрд╣рд┐рдбрд┐рдУ рдирд╛рд╣реА, рддрд░ рднреНрд░рд╖реНрдЯрд╛рдЪрд╛рд░рд╛рд╡рд┐рд░реЛрдзрд╛рдд (Corruption) рдЖрдгрд┐ рдЬрдмрд╛рдмрджрд╛рд░реАрд╕рд╛рдареА (Accountability) рдирд╛рдЧрд░рд┐рдХрд╛рдВрдЪрд╛ рдЖрд╡рд╛рдЬ рдЖрд╣реЗ. рдкреНрд░рд╢рд╛рд╕рдирд╛рдиреЗ @PCMCINDIAPCMC INDIA рдпрд╛рд╡рд░ рддреНрд╡рд░рд┐рдд рд▓рдХреНрд╖ рджреЗрдКрди рдХрд╛рд░рд╡рд╛рдИ рдХрд░рдгреЗ рдЖрд╡рд╢реНрдпрдХ рдЖрд╣реЗ.

ЁЯСЗ┬ард╡реНрд╣рд┐рдбрд┐рдУрдордзреНрдпреЗ рдХрд╛рдп рдЖрд╣реЗ:
рдХрдЪрд▒реНрдпрд╛рдЪреЗ рдвреАрдЧ рдЖрдгрд┐ рдЕрд╕реНрд╡рдЪреНрдЫрддреЗрдЪреА рд╕реНрдерд┐рддреА
рд╕реНрдерд╛рдирд┐рдХ рдирд╛рдЧрд░рд┐рдХрд╛рдВрдЪреНрдпрд╛ рдкреНрд░рддрд┐рдХреНрд░рд┐рдпрд╛
рд╕рдВрдмрдВрдзрд┐рдд рд╡рд┐рднрд╛рдЧрд╛рдЪреНрдпрд╛ рджреБрд░реНрд▓рдХреНрд╖рд╛рдЪреЗ рдкреБрд░рд╛рд╡реЗ
рднреНрд░рд╖реНрдЯрд╛рдЪрд╛рд░ рдЙрдШрдб рдХрд░рдгрд╛рд░реЗ рджреГрд╢реНрдп

ЁЯТм┬арддреБрдордЪрдВ рдордд рдХрд╛рдп?
рддреБрдореНрд╣реА рднреЛрд╕рд░реА рдПрдордЖрдпрдбреАрд╕реАрдордзреНрдпреЗ рдХрд╛рдо рдХрд░рддрд╛ рдХрд┐рдВрд╡рд╛ рд░рд╛рд╣рддрд╛ рдХрд╛? рддреБрдореНрд╣рд╛рд▓рд╛рд╣реА рдЕрд╢рд╛рдЪ рд╕рдорд╕реНрдпрд╛рдВрдЪрд╛ рд╕рд╛рдордирд╛ рдХрд░рд╛рд╡рд╛ рд▓рд╛рдЧрддреЛрдп рдХрд╛? рддреБрдордЪреНрдпрд╛ рдкреНрд░рддрд┐рдХреНрд░рд┐рдпрд╛ рдЖрдгрд┐ рдЕрдиреБрднрд╡┬ардХрдореЗрдВрдЯрдордзреНрдпреЗ рдирдХреНрдХреА рд╕рд╛рдВрдЧрд╛. рдкреНрд░рддреНрдпреЗрдХ рдХрдореЗрдВрдЯ рдорд╣рддреНрддреНрд╡рд╛рдЪреА рдЖрд╣реЗ!

ЁЯСН┬ардЖрдореНрд╣рд╛рд▓рд╛ рдкрд╛рдард┐рдВрдмрд╛ рджреНрдпрд╛:

рд▓рд╛рдИрдХ (Like)┬ардХрд░рд╛, рдЬреЗрдгреЗрдХрд░реВрди рд╣рд╛ рд╡реНрд╣рд┐рдбрд┐рдУ рдЬрд╛рд╕реНрддреАрдд рдЬрд╛рд╕реНрдд рд▓реЛрдХрд╛рдВрдкрд░реНрдпрдВрдд рдкреЛрд╣реЛрдЪреЗрд▓.

рд╢реЗрдЕрд░ (Share)┬ардХрд░рд╛, рдЬреЗрдгреЗрдХрд░реВрди рдкреНрд░рд╢рд╛рд╕рдирд╛рд╡рд░ рдХрд╛рд░рд╡рд╛рдИрд╕рд╛рдареА рджрдмрд╛рд╡ рд╡рд╛рдвреЗрд▓.

рд╕рдмрд╕реНрдХреНрд░рд╛рдИрдм (Subscribe)┬ардХрд░рд╛ рдЖрдгрд┐ рдмреЗрд▓ рдЖрдпрдХреЙрди рджрд╛рдмрд╛ рдЕрд╢рд╛ рдорд╣рддреНрддреНрд╡рд╛рдЪреНрдпрд╛ рдмрд╛рддрдореНрдпрд╛ рдЖрдгрд┐ рдирд╛рдЧрд░рд┐рдХ рдкрддреНрд░рдХрд╛рд░рд┐рддреЗрд╕рд╛рдареА.

I Am Citizen.

This morning in Baramati, Maharashtra, a chartered Learjet 45 aircraft carrying Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar crashed while attempting to land at Baramati airport. The flight had taken off from Mumbai and around 8:45 am lost control on landing, catching fire on impact. According to DGCA and multiple news sources, Ajit Pawar and all four others on board тАФ including pilots and aides тАФ were killed in the crash. The tragic incident has sent shockwaves across the state with political and public reactions, and investigations are underway.

I Am Citizen.

Who is development really forтАФcitizens or contractors and corrupt officials?
This video exposes the ground reality of so-called development work in Pimpri-Chinchwad. On MoshiтАЩs Shiv Road, the road has been dug up without any prior notice or information board. As per rules, public works require advance notice, timelines, contractor details, and measures to reduce inconvenienceтАФbut none are visible here. With the road fully blocked in front of 5 to 7 housing societies, children, women, and senior citizens are struggling to cross. Vehicles cannot move; daily life, schools, jobs, and hospitals are disrupted. This is not developmentтАФit is imposed hardship. Authorities must ensure planned execution, transparency, and citizen safety. If you witness such illegal or mismanaged work, record it and report it. Development must serve citizens, not trouble them.

I Am Citizen.

In Pimpri-Chinchwad, citizens are forced to buy water through tankers. There is no alternative. Many housing societies are paying tanker bills of 2 lakh rupees per month. Despite tall claims of development in areas like Jadhavwadi, Kudalwadi, Chikhali, and across Pimpri-Chinchwad, the basic issue of water remains unresolved. What kind of development is this? Roads, buildings, and banners are visible, but water is missing. Citizens must now understand what each political party is saying about this serious water crisis, who is taking responsibility, and who is only making promises. This is not political promotion, but public awareness. Because water is not optionalтАФit is a matter of survival.
I Am Citizen.

Article 23тАУ24 тАУ Right Against Exploitation
Child labour, trafficking, and forced labour are punishable crimes.

The Right to Education (Article 21A) is a Fundamental Right of every child in India.
It guarantees free and compulsory education for children between 6 to 14 years of age and makes it the legal duty of the State.

The Indian Constitution, drafted by Dr. B. R. Ambedkar, ensures not only the right to live,
but the right to learn, grow, and live with dignity.
Without education, there is no equality, no justice, and no true development.

I Am Citizen is a digital movement raising its voice against violations of the Right to Education and for better schools, access, and opportunities for every child.

If a child is denied education today, the nation loses its future tomorrow.
Know your rights. Protect education. Raise your voice.
